content.p: We are inviting you to the PYROASIA Symposium 2023 (PyroAsia 2023) which will be held on 26 and 27 June, 2023 at The Majestic Hotel Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. There will be a social visit/lab visit to Genting on 28 June 2023. The conference is organised by University of Nottingham Malaysia together with the co-organisers PYROASIA Forum and Frontiers Lab, Japan. PYROASIA forum is an effort to bring a network of researchers and practitioners for the advancement and commercialization of pyrolysis and related technologies for future fuels. Participants are cordially invited to submit their original work for presentation. PYROASIA symposium 2023 will include presentations from all thermo-chemical conversion technologies for fuel production.
